## `IgnoreBlankLines`

Sets whether to ignore blank lines when figuring out if we are at the end of a paragraph for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
IgnoreBlankLines(boolean ignore)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` ignore | `true` to ignore blank lines. |
